location.description: Location where the AWS CodeBuild project stores cached resources. For type `S3`, the value must be a valid S3 bucket name/prefix.

modes.description: Specifies settings that AWS CodeBuild uses to store and reuse build dependencies. Valid values:  `LOCAL_SOURCE_CACHE`, `LOCAL_DOCKER_LAYER_CACHE`, `LOCAL_CUSTOM_CACHE`.

type.description: Type of storage that will be used for the AWS CodeBuild project cache. Valid values: `NO_CACHE`, `LOCAL`, `S3`. Defaults to `NO_CACHE`.
